alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 12:29PM MST until February 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Johnson County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Friday. The steadiest snow is expected late tonight and the strongest wind is expected on Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
